name: Benny & Banny
description:
Banny and Benny are two rabbits that have had their own socket for earthworms that spit acid soil, so they decide to clean their burrow and eliminate all earthworms from the burrow.

This game was developed by students of digital games from the Universidade Feevale

Joao Victor Amaral Eibs - Environment Scenarios / Interface
Francisco Sousa - Programming / Audio Design
Vitor Lopes - Charater Design / Animation
Rubens Muller - Programming / Level Design
